content.title: Protein-Losing Enteropathy in Lymphatic Disease
content.description: Intestinal lymphatic dysfunction causing protein loss

key_concepts.details: Intestinal lymphatic obstruction or malformation causes lymph leakage into GI lumen
Elevated stool alpha-1 antitrypsin; endoscopy may show lymphangiectasia
Medium-chain triglyceride diet (absorbed directly into portal system), treat underlying cause

content.clinical_significance: Rare but treatable cause of hypoalbuminemia and edema

primary_sources: Vignes S et al. Int J Dermatol 2018
